creditline:
In memory of Mauricio and Emilia Barragan Lasansky.
From their children:  William Abraham, Rocio Aitana, Leonardo, Maria Jimena, Luis Felipe and Tomás
description: face mask; medium wood tone; oval open mouth; almond-shaped open eyes; conical nose; pairs of lines from nose up over forehead and etending from corners of eyes to temples, with lines around eyes; C-shaped ears; triangles, parallel lines and conch shell-like motifs on hair; black metal mount included
title: Mask
